title: IEndCapFeatureData.UseThicknessRatioForOffset
description: Gets or sets whether a ratio of the thickness is used to specify the offset for this end-cap feature.
returns: True to use a ratio of the thickness, false to not
remarks:
If this property is set to...
Then you can use...
True
IEndCapFeatureData::ThicknessRatioForOffset
to set the offset distance of the end cap as a ratio of the thickness of the structural member being capped.
False
IEndCapFeatureData::OffsetDistance
to set the offset distance for this end-cap feature.
